sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtncmmntyuser ( CMMNTY_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ , MNGR_AT /* */ , SBSCRB_DE /* */ , SECSN_DE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #cmmntyId# /* */ , #emplyrId# /* */ , #mngrAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #secsnDe# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtncmmntyuser SET CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ , EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */ , MNGR_AT=#mngrAt# /* */ , SBSCRB_DE=#sbscrbDe# /* */ , SECSN_DE=#secsnDe# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CMMNTY_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ , MNGR_AT /* */ , SBSCRB_DE /* */ , SECSN_DE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */

SELECT CMMNTY_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ , MNGR_AT /* */ , SBSCRB_DE /* */ , SECSN_DE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtncmmntyuser WHERE 1=1
CMMNTY_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EMPLYR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CMMNTY_ID DESC /* */ , EMPLYR_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

CMMNTY_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
